guiPack

Class EngineController

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiPack.EngineController

  • public class EngineController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class based off the MVC design principle. Takes input from the view(GUI) and relays the information to the various engine components to affect the required state changes
    Author:
    Douglas Wallin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MapEngine algorithm
      Instance of the Map Engine.
      private LineModeller lineModel
      Instance of the LineModeller engine component.
      GVSUMap map
      A hardcoded graphical representation of the GVSU Allendale campus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EngineController(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
      This constructor instantiates each of the engine components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void drawPath(java.util.LinkedList<MapNode> path)
      The getDirections method uses this to change pixels on the BufferedImage.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getDirections(java.lang.String srcNodeInfo, java.lang.String destNodeInfo)
      This is one of two primarily used methods from the view.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage() 
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage reset()

    • Field Detail

      • lineModel

        private LineModeller lineModel
        Instance of the LineModeller engine component. Handles all changes to the BufferedImage

      • algorithm

        private MapEngine algorithm
        Instance of the Map Engine. Handles all algorithm work in determining the shortest path to a destination requested by the view.

      • map

        public final GVSUMap map
        A hardcoded graphical representation of the GVSU Allendale campus

    • Constructor Detail

      • EngineController

        public EngineController(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
        This constructor instantiates each of the engine components.
        Parameters:
        img - BufferedImage: The picture to have directions drawn on

    • Method Detail

      • getDirections

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getDirections(java.lang.String srcNodeInfo,
                                                  java.lang.String destNodeInfo)
        This is one of two primarily used methods from the view. This draws the directions between two nodes that are specified by the nodeInfo entered.
        Parameters:
        sourceNodeInfo - String: The nodeInfo member of the node desired for the source node
        destNodeInfo - String: The nodeInfo member of the node desired for the source node
        Returns:
        BufferedImage: Returns a BufferedImage with directions drawn on it to correspond to the shortest path between the source and destination node

      • drawPath

        private void drawPath(java.util.LinkedList<MapNode> path)
        The getDirections method uses this to change pixels on the BufferedImage. It does most of the interaction with the LineModeller component
        Parameters:
        path - LinkedList: A path from node to node (the solution)

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Returns:
        BufferedImage: The image to display in the GUI

      • reset

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage reset()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Resets all engine components to be used once again.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage: An original copy of the map without altered pixels
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
